message: My turn! Let's be reasonable.  I'll take a little more since you wasted a round.
Come on, let's meet halfway, I've lost value already
The clock is ticking, Alice.  This is a good deal for you - take it before it gets worse!
Don't think I'll give in that easily, still room for compromise
Okay, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and we both lose if this fails.
